column4: hello, everybody. could you tell me please, if i would like to use some ppa repo from launchpad, where can i get *.asc key for such repo?
- bare in mind that if you ad a repo from a trusted souce - it will still actually be working (and giving a warning...) if you do not get the key..
yes, i know. but i don't like warnings :-)
- figures - but if you just need a single packet or two... ;=)
